testcase.name: test_reports_leaves_endpoint
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_star_rewards.py:381: in test_reports_leaves_endpoint assert response.status_code == 200, f"Failed to get leave reports: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Failed to get leave reports: {"detail":[{"type":"missing","loc":["query","from_date"],"msg":"Field required","input":null,"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"},{"type":"missing","loc":["query","to_date"],"msg":"Field required","input":null,"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"}]} E assert 422 == 200 E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
